title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Fall riding in Lynn Woods, MA
content:
Photo taken by Andrew Halley of Austin Liu, “Riding in Lynn Woods in Lynn, Massachusetts where there are lots of natural granite features to huck.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day.
